# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with excellence. This product not only stands as a testament to quality but also comes with a host of features that make it an indispensable addition to your collection. Given its exceptional craftsmanship and unique benefits, I believe it's worth more than its face value. I kindly invite you to consider purchasing this item for $120. I trust that you will find immense value in it. Should you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
